{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04581v1", "title": "Matchings in Corona graph and classical symmetric varieties", "summary": "We introduce an alternative combinatorial parametrization of Borel orbits in
classical symmetric varieties using matchings of the Corona graph. As an
application, we obtain ultra log-concavity and unimodality for the number of
Borel orbits in Types AIII and CII. Moreover, we prove a conjecture of Can and
Ugurlu concerning the non-integrality of the coefficients of the polynomial
that interpolates the number of orbits in Type BI.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO,math.RT", "published": "2025-05-07T17:20:38Z"}
